sub_title: Project Manager bij AddVision Projectontwikkeling & Management
summary:
Proud Mex-I-CAN

Project Manager at AddVision, developing meaningful projects with economical and social development, impacting positively Zeeland's region.

Ask me more: sayra@add-vision.nl

Former Project Manager and Skills Analyst at the Youth institution, IMJU León in Mexico. Creating meaningful programs for talented young people. Developing the soft skills of our youth through physical and online workshops and conferences among other activities.

Former AIESEC member, international organization present in more than 126 countries. 
Former Talent Management and Organizational Development Manager for AIESEC in Slovakia, directly responsible for HR teams. Designing the Learning Experience Journey of members, delivering conferences and trainings.

Former Product Manager for AIESEC in Norway. Account Manager with +10 Norwegian companies helping them to integrate international IT talent into their teams.

Former English Teacher for more than 500 high school students, passionate about using innovative methodologies to create great learning experiences.

Skills:
Coaching, team management, public speaking, analytical thinking, creativity, problem-solving.

Tools:
- Advanced Excel and powerful presentations with Powerpoint.
- Methodologies: Design Thinking, Business Canvas Model, Customer Journey Mapping, Empathy Map,
Community Canvas, Lean, amongst others.
- Team Management tools: Trello, Slack, Notion, Microsoft Teams, G Suite.
- General Design tools (Photoshop, Pixelmator, Premiere)

Ask me more: sayrareyesramirez@gmail.com
